lead_paragraph: Michael R. Bloomberg and Donald J. Trump had limited, yet friendly, interactions over the years as they occupied different circles of New York’s ultrarich. But that has changed.

byline.contributor: Maggie Haberman contributed reporting, and Doris Burke contributed research.

headline.print_headline: Bloomberg and Trump: Cordial Ties Have Soured
headline.main: For Trump and Bloomberg, Cordial Ties Have Soured

snippet: Michael R. Bloomberg and Donald J. Trump had limited, yet friendly, interactions over the years as they occupied different circles of New York’s ultrarich. But that has changed....
abstract: Cordial, if distant, relationship between former New York City Mayor Michael Bloomberg and Donald Trump has dissipated amid Bloomberg's vociferous criticism of Trump at Democratic National Convention.
